text: "Spirit in the Night" is a 1973 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is from his debut studio album Greetings from Asbury Park, N.J. The song was covered by Manfred Mann's Earth Band in 1975. It is from their sixth studio album Nightingales & Bombers. The song went to number 40 in the United States. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: Spirit in the Night
